start.heading: The Regime
start.quote:
"The ignorant man is not free, because what confronts him is an alien world... " - Hegel

This rabbit hole stretches for about 20 minutes. Trigger warning: sometimes intense political themes.

end.heading: Thank you for playing.
end.subheading: "The essence of democracy is not voting but speaking; not majority rule, but reasoned argument." - Fareed Zakaria
end.quote: Special thanks to: the staff and students of AFTRS.
